title: 1956 Austin-Healey 100 BN2 Roadster
description: This 1956 Austin-Healey 100 BN2 roadster was refurbished in the early 2000s, and it was purchased by the current owner on BaT in August 2022. Finished in red and black over red leather upholstery with white piping, the car is powered by a 2,660cc inline-four mated to a four-speed manual transmission with overdrive. Equipment includes 15″ wire wheels, a black removable soft top, a tilting windscreen, a louvered hood, dual SU H6 carburetors, a Denis Welch Motorsport aluminum cylinder head, a Moto-Lita steering wheel, and lap belts. The cylinder head was resurfaced in May 2025, and other work involved replacing the head gasket, starter solenoid, fuel pump, battery, a tie-rod-end boot, and a rear-axle seal as well as rewiring the voltage regulator and installing a heater valve. This BN2 is now offered on dealer consignment with recent service records, manufacturer’s literature, and a clean Oregon title in the owner's name.
author: bringatrailer
